title: Develuiza
author: Develuiza
created_time: March 02, 2023, 03:42:32 AMLast edit: March 04, 2023, 09:15:15 PM by Develuiza
content: Hello members of bitcointalk. i hope i created this topic on the currect forum.Check Demo (soon)Full casino script include 27 unique games and 100 slot gamesFrontend and backend full source is ready for use.Check FrontendCheck BackendLanguages: ReactJs , NodeJs , Postgres DatabaseAll codes,images and games created by me (except slot games). for more info, contact with me.Cost is : 2500 USDContact with me on telegram :https://t.me/cs_developerzContact with me for more resumes and more private casino scripts.

comments.author: Daltonik
comments.body: Hello, to begin with, in order to eliminate possible misunderstandings, you could confirm that you are the owner of this script, for example, by adding the footer of the icon with a link to the current bitcointalk thread to your web page, for example, next to the list of accepted cryptocurrencies.

comments.author: coinerer
comments.body: The domain name of the site is not bad. But according to your asking price, the site is not suitable. The site does not have google analytics set up due to which its traffic cannot be tracked.  It is not reasonable to buy this site for $2500 without enough traffic to the site. However you have not mentioned your payment method here yet.  And did not mention how the transaction will be done.  Since you are a newbie, no one will be interested in buying the site by paying directly from you in advance.  So I would advise you to use any of the forum's Escrow while selling the siteVisit this topic https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=2439910.0 You will find some trusted users in this topic who provide escrow service

comments.author: FatFork
comments.body: Quote from: coinerer on March 02, 2023, 11:37:53 AMThe domain name of the site is not bad. But according to your asking price, the site is not suitable. The site does not have google analytics set up due to which its traffic cannot be tracked.  It is not reasonable to buy this site for $2500 without enough traffic to the site. He's not selling a casino website, just a script. The stats for his demo domain don't matter much 'cause anyone who buys this script will need their own domain to build an online casino.Quote from: coinerer on March 02, 2023, 11:37:53 AMHowever you have not mentioned your payment method here yet.  And did not mention how the transaction will be done.  Since you are a newbie, no one will be interested in buying the site by paying directly from you in advance.  So I would advise you to use any of the forum's Escrow while selling the siteVisit this topic https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=2439910.0 You will find some trusted users in this topic who provide escrow serviceI totally agree that it's a good idea to use escrow for transactions like this, particularly when dealing with newbie accounts that have no reputation yet.

comments.author: goldkingcoiner
comments.body: Is this your own script? Did anyone audit this script? Do you have any public recognition for the authenticity? How do we know this script isn't full of bugs or malicious intent? This post is a reminder to everyone that trust is ok but here we would like some verification before we trust you.Have you sold scripts before? If not why start now?Whenever a newbie opens this kind of script selling thread, they always want to "continue talking" on Telegram. Seems strange to me.

comments.author: pawanjain
comments.body: I just had a glance for 30 seconds and found 3 UI issues on the site. Not sure how many functional and system issues I would find if I do the whole testing of the script.Still $2500 would be too costly for a script. Are these games from a game provider or built in script?I didn't check those details yet but if its from a game provider then that would bare a separate cost.

comments.author: CryptSafe
comments.body: OP, the site is not accessible from my own end here but however, putting up such for sale will need you to put your portfolio of your present and past work for view as well because buyers interested would want to see your past work as well for credibility and accuracy so they would be sure of what and who they are dealing with. I see some one here has already advised you to seek the expertise or involvement of an escrow for your own safety so as not to be a victim of scammers. Scammers are now rampant here looking for who to prey on and run away with their work or fund.

comments.author: Eureka_07
comments.body: How does casino script works? From what we can see from the webpages, what things do you own from it? Is the UI included? Sorrry for the dumb question. Quote from: coinerer on March 02, 2023, 11:37:53 AMThe site does not have google analytics set up due to which its traffic cannot be tracked.  <snip>This is only a demo link, it's ultimately understandable that it won't have enough analytics unless thousands of people access (which is nearly impossible to attain since it is only a demo link).

comments.author: paxmao
comments.body: Quote from: Daltonik on March 02, 2023, 11:15:12 AMHello, to begin with, in order to eliminate possible misunderstandings, you could confirm that you are the owner of this script, for example, by adding the footer of the icon with a link to the current bitcointalk thread to your web page, for example, next to the list of accepted cryptocurrencies.Beyond ownership, we are talking about a system that is going to deal with random events and managing money and wins and loses. The chances of having backdoors, hacks or even unintentionally poorly written code is far too high for anyone willing to invest. What guarantees can you provide about the code integrity? How can you certify this to be true?

comments.author: piebeyb
comments.body: I have always wanted to have a casino site but it seems difficult to run it, this is not just using a script but from a security perspective it is also necessary to pay attention that someone might be able to hack it and worry about losing money or user information data, I think maybe one day I will need this too , hope you have good luck selling it in this forum

comments.author: coinerer
comments.body: Quote from: Eureka_07 on March 02, 2023, 01:32:27 PMHow does casino script works? From what we can see from the webpages, what things do you own from it? Is the UI included? Sorrry for the dumb question. Script is the unique structure and plan of a businesses . Everything from how a site will be managed to what content will be on the site to what games will be included.  You just need to buy it and host the site on your domain and do various types of marketing to rank the site. As in a drama or film, the acting is performed according to a script.  If you buy this script, you will manage the site according to the same script, you will not need to plan for the site separately.  The key is that you have to buy a plan from him.

comments.author: robelneo
comments.body: I hope this is not another seller who re-coded another script from one popular marketplace just like the one who sells a script here, he should have a way to prove ownership of the script and if possible a testimonial from another buyer with a working casino from a script OP is selling, its better if the seller has his own site to house all the scripts he is selling, this is the easiest way to gain a reputation as a seller.Of course, I also will recommend an escrow its important to protect buyers from newbie sellers.

comments.author: Hispo
comments.body: Welcome to the forum.We have already had some people around here trying to sell casino scripts and other kind of software in the past and be aware that proving ownership over this material you are selling is important, some guy already got negative feedback for trying to steal other's work for their own profit.Also, you forgot to mention whether this deal you offer comes with future maintenance, updates, fixes and costumer support and any other warranties you are willing to provide.

comments.author: Daltonik
comments.body: Quote from: robelneo on March 02, 2023, 02:22:53 PMI hope this is not another seller who re-coded another script from one popular marketplace just like the one who sells a script here, he should have a way to prove ownership of the script and if possible a testimonial from another buyer with a working casino from a script OP is selling, its better if the seller has his own site to house all the scripts he is selling, this is the easiest way to gain a reputation as a seller.Of course, I also will recommend an escrow its important to protect buyers from newbie sellers.Let's hope for this and wait for some kind of update from the OP here, although he gave his contact in telegram and all contacts on the deal are apparently supposed to be there.

comments.author: CryptSafe
comments.body: Quote from: Daltonik on March 03, 2023, 09:05:14 AMQuote from: robelneo on March 02, 2023, 02:22:53 PMI hope this is not another seller who re-coded another script from one popular marketplace just like the one who sells a script here, he should have a way to prove ownership of the script and if possible a testimonial from another buyer with a working casino from a script OP is selling, its better if the seller has his own site to house all the scripts he is selling, this is the easiest way to gain a reputation as a seller.Of course, I also will recommend an escrow its important to protect buyers from newbie sellers.Let's hope for this and wait for some kind of update from the OP here, although he gave his contact in telegram and all contacts on the deal are apparently supposed to be there.I think OP should provide proof of ownership that he owns the script and also provide his portfolio and previous works. He should also call for his past clients to vouch for him or her here so that any potential buyer would know and have that confidence in what they are buying as these days it is just a copy cat and prototype of what others have down some people would rewrite and put up for sale for an inexperienced buyer to buy and start suffering from hacks. I am not too comfortable with the telegram conversation op opted for, I would prefer every conversation about this deal be here for transparency and credibility so other members could also contribute to the conversation for any potential buyer. The conversation started here and should end here and lastly like I have said earlier before now, there should be an escrow for this deal so that both parties involved will haveo differences as to reaching and honouring agreement.

comments.author: coin-investor
comments.body: So 24 hours have passed and OP is not posting anything when he should, if you're selling something here, especially in this section you should check replies right away for those who will ask about the script that you're selling, he did not mention anything about escrow and proof of his ownership of the script he is selling.He should be transparent and don't just post the telegram channel its better that buyer checked this thread for answers on questions posted here before contacting the seller.

comments.author: FatFork
comments.body: Quote from: coinerer on March 02, 2023, 01:57:04 PMQuote from: Eureka_07 on March 02, 2023, 01:32:27 PMHow does casino script works? From what we can see from the webpages, what things do you own from it? Is the UI included? Sorrry for the dumb question. Script is the unique structure and plan of a businesses . Everything from how a site will be managed to what content will be on the site to what games will be included.  You just need to buy it and host the site on your domain and do various types of marketing to rank the site. As in a drama or film, the acting is performed according to a script.  If you buy this script, you will manage the site according to the same script, you will not need to plan for the site separately.  The key is that you have to buy a plan from him. I don't think that's the script we're talking about. In this context, a script refers to software - code written in scripting languages like PHP or JavaScript - that you install on your web server to operate an online casino. The software itself has little impact on how you want to run your casino or your business plan. Although, when it comes to setting up an online casino, the script you choose to use is an important consideration, but it's only one piece of the puzzle.

comments.author: dezoel
comments.body: Quote from: Hispo on March 02, 2023, 02:41:30 PMWelcome to the forum.We have already had some people around here trying to sell casino scripts and other kind of software in the past and be aware that proving ownership over this material you are selling is important, some guy already got negative feedback for trying to steal other's work for their own profit.Also, you forgot to mention whether this deal you offer comes with future maintenance, updates, fixes and costumer support and any other warranties you are willing to provide. Negative feedback can't do much because his account was only a newbie but for someone who is interested on buying this, they need to undergo in a process to make sure that the transaction is legit and will go smoothly. There must be a way to prove that the OP owns the script and he didn't just steal it from somewhere else.I don't know if the offered price is already too much only for the script or not but if it is, then maybe we can ask for a follow up maintenance as there might be some issues that can occur later on. In fact one user above already found 3 issues as he said. That's a good catch, maybe that user do also has an experience on the same field.

comments.author: decodx
comments.body: Quote from: dezoel on March 04, 2023, 06:41:34 PMQuote from: Hispo on March 02, 2023, 02:41:30 PMWelcome to the forum.We have already had some people around here trying to sell casino scripts and other kind of software in the past and be aware that proving ownership over this material you are selling is important, some guy already got negative feedback for trying to steal other's work for their own profit.Also, you forgot to mention whether this deal you offer comes with future maintenance, updates, fixes and costumer support and any other warranties you are willing to provide. Negative feedback can't do much because his account was only a newbie but for someone who is interested on buying this, they need to undergo in a process to make sure that the transaction is legit and will go smoothly. There must be a way to prove that the OP owns the script and he didn't just steal it from somewhere else.I don't know if the offered price is already too much only for the script or not but if it is, then maybe we can ask for a follow up maintenance as there might be some issues that can occur later on. In fact one user above already found 3 issues as he said. That's a good catch, maybe that user do also has an experience on the same field.I totally agree with you on this. It's hard to tell if the price for the script is too high or not, but requesting follow-up maintenance seems like a smart idea. It's always possible that issues might arise later on, and having someone available to address them would definitely give us peace of mind. While it's tempting to consider purchasing a casino script from an individual seller, there are definitely some risks involved, especially when it comes to quality control and ongoing support. In my opinion, it's worth investing in a script from a reputable company that has a proven track record of providing excellent customer support and serving a satisfied user base. This way, you can rest assured that the script you're getting is high-quality and has been thoroughly vetted by experts in the field.No offense to the OP or any individual sellers out there - I'm sure there are some great scripts available from individuals as well. But for something as important as a casino script, I personally would feel more comfortable going with a company that has established itself as a trusted provider in the industry. What do you guys think? Have any of you had experience purchasing casino scripts from individual sellers?

comments.author: swaga
comments.body: This seller is potentially a scammer.Here is why:He gave me this address as demo: https://winss.games/Yet if you go to that website and inspect metadata this is what you'll find: https://i.imgur.com/1xxAVZx.jpegIf you google playcrash.com you will find out they made a post on this forum some time ago: https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5394221.0In that thread it's revealed that playcrash.com is a copy of bgame.io casino.Funny enough there was a bct member selling this website on here: https://ninjastic.space/post/57226376user @amoonaser is still active on this forum so if OP is legit why does he have 2 accounts?Bonus:OP did use github nor did he write any sort of documentation for this project: https://i.imgur.com/xQhOdZq.jpg and https://i.imgur.com/5qDgB0A.jpgId like to be wrong but it seems like OP is trying to scam for 2.5k
